attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nambucca is a widely loved pub in Holloway, North London.
BUT it is so much more than your average pub.
It hosts bands about 4 live music nights a week.
It has Photography and Art Exhibitions.
It recently hosted a Oxjam event to raise money for Oxfam.
They have got comfy sofas.
A have Addams family pinball and various arcade machines.
The famous Wonk Wednesdays is held here and is the best night in North London!

To the locals it’s a safe haven to just unwind, and to new comers its great new experience. 

Now to get to the matter at hand, 
a small group have started a petition to shut down Nambucca before Christmas!
This is due to noise after hours.

To the people who are signing this I have to say
That Nambucca is a pub, what do you expect?
Why are you singling out one out of many?

Its OUR job as a community to save our right to enjoy a night out at our favorte local.

So put your signature down, and make sure to sign the ones on the bar as well!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
